resources.string: Chinese Checkers is a board game. Every player has 10 pieces. The winner is the one that first races his pieces across the board.

A piece hops over another piece, no matters the color.
 You can chain several hops in a single move.
 We consider the fast-paced rules : long hops are allowed as illustrated above.
All pieces always remain on the bord.
